#summary Installing Gource on Leopard/Snow Leopard

== Macports ==

Gource is now in [http://www.macports.org/ Macports]. [http://www.macports.org/install.php Once you have installed Macports] you can install gource with this command:

{{{
sudo port install gource
}}}

== Homebrew ==

You can also install the current bleeding-edge development version of Gource via [http://mxcl.github.com/homebrew/ Homebrew].

{{{
brew install gource
}}}
